title: Hafiyyat
subtitle: Secure Steganography Mobile App
description: Advanced mobile steganography application that embeds hidden data inside images using LSB method with an additional encryption layer. Built with Flutter, it enables secure data transfer and discreet storage with support for full-color image concealment.

sections.technologiesDesc: Leveraging modern tools and frameworks to build a robust solution
sections.resultsDesc: Measurable outcomes that demonstrate the success of the project
